translations: 梦想家（dreamer 的复数形式）；做梦的人

sentences.sentence: When the dust settled, the space dreamers lost out.
sentences.translation: 当尘埃落定，太空梦想者们就输了。

sentences.sentence: Tomorrow we will transcend these as well, and the dreamers will deserve a lot of the credit.
sentences.translation: 明天我们也将超越这些成就，且梦想家们将会得到更多的荣誉。

sentences.sentence: Dreamers do not always remember their dreams.
sentences.translation: 做梦的人并不总能记住自己的梦。
